title: The Ready Set [2 EP's]
description:
Finally i bought the 2 albums!!

Mp3 format,320 kbps.



The Ready Set is the solo project of 19 year old Jordan Witzigreuter, started November 17th, 2007. His interest in music formed when he began playing drums are the age of 10. By the age of 14 he was playing in bands, and by the age of 16 he was touring in them. He later found a different outlet for his creativity through writing lyrics and music in an acoustic duo, which eventually led to the formation of The Ready Set. When the other member left to pursue a different career, Jordan decided to take the songs he had started, finish them up, and put together a Myspace page just for fun. Shortly after his high school graduation, he began touring in other bands, which made it clear to him where his heart was: The Ready Set. In July of 2008 he released ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œTantrum CastleÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½ and began touring full-time as The Ready Set. His live performances have evolved greatly since his early days, changing from a two-man show with keys, vocals, and a computer, to a complete full-band show with bass, drums, and lights. The Ready Set will be touring nationally throughout the majority of 2009, and Jordan will be hitting the studio in March to record new material.
